title: How to Complete Puzzle 1 4 in Scribblenauts

steps.headline: Look at the given hint: "Give the farmer three farm animals!"
Tap on the notebook in the right hand corner.
Tap on the letters to write solutions.
steps.description:
Goat
Pig
Cow
Horse
Sheep
Turkey (bird)
Cat
Rooster
Dog

steps.headline: Drag the animals to the farmer.
Get the starite to complete the level.

text:
Look at the given hint: "Give the farmer three farm animals!"  Tap on the notebook in the right hand corner.  Tap on the letters to write solutions. Goat
Pig
Cow
Horse
Sheep
Turkey (bird)
Cat
Rooster
Dog Drag the animals to the farmer.  Get the starite to complete the level.
